availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. C. Cochran (Fayette County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, resident. Mississippi native. Married to Harriet L. Wilson Cochran on May 12, 1852. Married to E. D. Cochran. Father of E. D. Cochran, M. W. Cochran, S. P. Cochran, and O. T. Cochran. Resident of Fayette County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Ward 3, city of Lexington, p. 119.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994035, Graves County Marriages, p. unknown.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994035, Graves County Deaths, p. unknown.
